sections.heading: Short title.   This Act may be cited as the Teacher
Legislative findings and declarations.  The General
sections.text: Assembly finds and declares all of the following:

sections.heading: Qualifying for loan.   In order to qualify for a loan
sections.text:
under this Act,
all of the following
criteria must be met:

sections.heading: Rules.   The State Board of Education and the
sections.text:
Authority may adopt any rules necessary to carry out their
responsibilities under this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
